attributes.additional_details: We as a British society find it absolutey disgraceful that Muslim staff members of M&S are allowed to refuse customers pork and alcohol. We are a society where such products are everywhere and to which we are customed to.  Such staff members know very well before accepting employment what products they will be handling.  Enough is Enough.  Where are our rights as a British society.  Please ban this stupid rule from Marks and Spencers, there are alot of unhappy people me being one of them!
